item.title: New Yahoo Mail UI
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: I seldom like new UI of product I use, the extreme example is I HATE the new gmail UI whenever it was launched more than a year ago – it took me quite some time to figure out where is addressbook and where I can manage my domain. However, Yahoo Mail’s new UI is definitely [...]
item.content:encoded:
I seldom like new UI of product I use, the extreme example is I HATE the new gmail UI whenever it was launched more than a year ago – it took me quite some time to figure out where is addressbook and where I can manage my domain.

However, Yahoo Mail’s new UI is definitely better than previous version, light, clean, and most things are still there – either it did not change, or it can be easily located.

Well done, Yahoo.

item.title: There is still something good, anyway
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: Got a mail from the big David, some good words though looks like from a template :D, but anyway it’s something good that I’m glad to get it after all these years service.
item.content:encoded: Got a mail from the big David, some good words though looks like from a template :D, but anyway it’s something good that I’m glad to get it after all these years service.
